name: What is Networking
description: Networking is how data moves across the internet and within cloud environments. Understanding the basics is crucial.

learning_steps.title: What is Networking
learning_steps.description: Learn how data moves across networks and why networking knowledge is essential for cloud engineering.

learning_steps.title: What is an IP Address?
learning_steps.description: Understand IP addresses—the unique identifiers that allow devices to communicate.

learning_steps.title: What is DNS?
learning_steps.description: Learn how DNS translates domain names into IP addresses—the phonebook of the internet.

questions.prompt: How would you explain IP addresses to someone new to networking, including the difference between public and private IPs?
scenario_seeds: A developer asks why their app works locally but can't be reached from the internet
Your security team wants to know why internal services use different IP ranges than public-facing ones
A colleague is confused why their home router and their laptop both seem to have different IPs
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain what an IP address is (unique identifier for devices) AND clearly distinguish public vs private IPs AND explain when/why each type is used in real scenarios.

questions.prompt: Walk me through how DNS works when a user types a website URL into their browser.
scenario_seeds: A user reports the website is down but you can access it by IP—what's happening?
Your team is setting up a new domain and someone asks how users will find your servers
A developer wants to understand why DNS changes take time to propagate
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain DNS as translation between domain names and IPs AND walk through the lookup process (browser → resolver → root/TLD/authoritative) AND explain why DNS is essential for internet usability.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what an IP address is and how it's used?
Can you quiz me on what DNS does and why it's important?
Can you ask me to explain the difference between public and private IP addresses?

learning_objectives.text: Understand how IP addresses, DNS, and routing work
Know the OSI model and common networking protocols
